text.description: Summons Moon Dragon at the beggining of the battle.
text.event: This place reminds you of legends about the Ancients - a ruined temple filled with all sorts of strange objects. One of them is not like the others, however - the golden treasure glares across the whole room. You quickly pick it up and exit the temple, hoping no one will try to steal it from you.
text.name: Moon Egg
